item.title: Actual integration tests
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Actual integration tests Many times we have some piece of code that is tested but is still failing in production. How is that possible? Is that because of bad tests or we have a greater hidden issue? Protect your vital functionality with integration tests Integration tests are the best way make sure that a functionality does not degradate when adding new features. What are integration tests Integration tests are tests that check a full feature of the project.
